contents: I know that even when I come to this channel, I can't speak freely, but compared to many places, this is where I can satisfy my desire to speak, this is my first choice of venue, I'm not particularly dependent on your channel, but it makes me happy to find more like minded people in the pipeline!I came here on the introduction of several friends, saying that what is said here is very reasonable, I am also an explorer who like to explore the fact contained in language, inside and outside information difference, the information gap between China and the rest of the world left me confused and uncomfortable, so I decided to come here and learn what I wanted to learn.
